Skills

What I use in my work

HTML5

It is he who creates the framework of your website or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure of your product

CSS3

This style language allows me to create absolutely any appearance of your website or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!

Java Script

This programming language allows you to animate anything: sliders, windows, hints, tabs, receiving data from the server and much more

Jquery

The Jquery library will speed up development. We will not integrate it into the project without the need, but the skill of working with it is present

React

This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product exactly for your purposes

Node.js

This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - “brains” that will perform actions that the user does not see

Mongo.db

This is not a relational database that will store the data of your website or application

Privacy Notices

We would like to inform you about the personal data collected about you by the company, for what purposes and your rights in this regard. Please select the Privacy Notice relevant to you from the ones below.

These Privacy Notices may be supplemented with local/additional notifications. These Notices are also available in local languages (where applicable) on the website.

We have adopted

Binding_Rules.pdf, 355 kB, that provide a privacy framework approved by the Data Protection Authority, so that companies can legally transfer the personal data of their European employees and customers to other companies in accordance with EU Data Protection Law

Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or concerns related to the processing of your personal data - contact information is provided in the relevant Privacy Notice below and on the website.
